attributes.action: award Ross Kemp a knighthood for his services to journalism in Afghanistan.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: After watching Ross Kemp in Afghanistan and return to Afghanistan with the 1 R ANGLIAN, "The Vikings") of the Royal Anglian Regiment and the Argyll and Sutherland Highlanders (5 SCOTS), the 5th battallion of the Royal Regiment of Scotland, we feel that Ross Kemp deserves a knighthood for his efforts and bravery to show the general British public what life is really like for a solider on the front line of war.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.honours.gov.uk/
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
